> * save 20% when buying 8 patterns this pattern is available in english only and uses standard us crochet terminology ***description*** if you ve been searching for an easy crochet pumpkin pattern that works up quickly and still has plenty of texture you ve just found your new favorite this extended single_crochet pumpkin is simple enough for beginners yet satisfying for experienced crocheters who want a mindless stash-busting project with its simple yet beautifully textured stitch and straight-forward construction this pattern is your invitation to go wild and pick the craziest colors from your stash do you have any yarn leftover from a sweater that s too gorgeous to toss but not enough yardage to make anything out of this pumpkin is the perfect in-between project that will finally put your precious leftover yarn to great use go bold with variegated yarns keep it classic with solids or mix and match multiple yarns in one pumpkin the possibilities are truly endless ***finished measurements*** measurements reflect the finished size after assembly finished circumference 10 13 25 16 5 inches or 25 34 42 cm finished height 1 1 5 2 5 inches or 3 4 6 cm ***difficulty*** beginner ***materials*** yarn the samples are shown in dk and worsted weight yarn but any yarn weight will work great with this pattern remember to pick an appropriate hook size the goal is to create a dense enough fabric so that the stuffing won t peek through variegated pumpkins feisty fibres rockin dk 100% sw merino 246 yds/225 m per 3 5 oz/100 g skein in trippin solid color pumpkin the frosted stitch winter worsted 100% sw merino 218 yds/200 m per 3 5 oz/100 g skein in moss campion hooks us h-8/5 0 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge notions scissors tapestry needle fiberfill cinnamon sticks ***yardage*** 40 75 120 yds or 35 70 110 m these yardages are estimated based on the dk weight samples if using a different weight yarn keep in mind that your yardage and dimensions may vary ***how do i download my pattern *** after completing the payment check your inbox for an email containing a download link button for the pdf pattern you will need a pdf reader installed to open the pattern ***socials*** instagram @crochethighway facebook crochethighway ravelry crochet highway designs ***pattern support*** for pattern related questions please join my facebook support group crochethighway
